_sText:
zm_miniature_room_v1

NOTE: map is made for zm_reload has not been tested by me for infinite ammo, I will most likely make an infinite ammo version as well and release that...
The map is not meant to have gravity, as the spots are made so that they don't need gravity and if it is there ruins the map...

Map Features:
50 Spawns
Double Buyzone at t spawn (fix the buyzone bug)
Custom Textures
Rats map
Over 20 Spots
1 Secret
Nav file
Good Fps (on your own or playing with others)
Mixed unique gameplay


Please note: This map was not copied or based off of de_dolls it was just an idea that came to me when I was bored and started mapping, after 7 beta's I finally got to a product I thought was good and could be released to the public.

Also:  All DECENT feedback is welcome :D

Thanks for interest in my map!
alex (terrora/ roluffy)

My first released map "yay"


Little machinima video I made for the map, was gonna be longer to advertise it but I ran out of time so only have a tiny section of the map...
